title: Harringdons Premium Tea Towels for Kitchen – 12-Pack 100% Natural Cotton Dish Towels, Quick Drying, Ultra Absorbent, Bleach Safe, 50x70 cm (Assorted Colours)
features: [CRAFTED FROM 100% COTTON – ECO-FRIENDLY] Made from premium cotton, our kitchen tea towels are a sustainable alternative to paper towels. These lint free cloths deliver exceptional absorbency, softness, and durability — a smart choice for everyday kitchen use.

[ELEGANT, VERSATILE & BUILT TO LAST] The timeless herringbone weave in white tea towels adds refined style to any kitchen. Designed for lasting performance, these quick-drying tea towels and dish towels help maintain a hygienic, fresh kitchen environment.

[MULTI-USE TOWELS FOR MODERN KITCHENS] Perfect as dish cloths for washing up, kitchen hand towels, or stylish kitchen cloths, this towels set is made for drying, cleaning, wiping, or even wrapping fresh bread. An essential part of your household and new home essentials.

[PERSONALISE OR GIFT – IDEAL FOR CRAFTS] Each 100% cotton tea towel is thick enough for embroidery, allowing you to customise your t towels for gifts, décor, or creative projects. A thoughtful addition to home accessories and perfect for gifting with your kitchen essentials.

[SMART STORAGE, EVERYDAY COMFORT] Each tea towel includes a discreet hanging loop for easy access and organisation. These kitchen towels become softer with every wash — a reliable tea towels pack that blends performance with premium comfort for your kitchen accessories.
description: Product Description Harringdons Tea Dish Towels Our Kitchen Dish towels are your best option if you are looking for a type of towel that is soft yet durable and versatile yet practical. Cotton Creation’s towels are made from cotton material that is soft to the touch but capable of withstanding consistent use with demanding kitchen tasks. Simply machine wash with cold water, tumble dry low and hang them up using the attached loop. Bleach-friendly for optimal cleaning, maintaining a fresh look after every wash. Our high-quality Spun Cotton material and durable thread count give them a long lifetime. These towels are also lint-free! So you won’t have to worry about unwanted fluff left behind after drying your dishes or wiping your windows. All-Purpose Use Soft & Absorbent It’s made from VIRGIN combed cotton. Cotton has a much higher absorbency than other materials. These thicker Tea Towels soak up the moisture and dry out quickly. Embroidery & Hand Crafts Kitchen Dish towels can decorate using iron-on embroidery patterns, fabric paints, silk screening, and machine embroidery. Machine Washable Harringdons Dish towels can be easily washed at 40° C to remove any stains. To minimize shrinkage, wash at 30° C. Herringbone weave The flat Herringbone weave makes our kitchen hand towels lightweight, absorbent and quick-drying. They leave a lint-free, streak-free, and smooth finish. Choose Towel Harringdons for Exceptional Tea Towels How Often Should You Change Your Kitchen Towels ? How frequently you wash the kitchen towels can reduce the chance of people getting sick. You should wash your kitchen towels at least every day. Incorporate kitchen towel cleaning when you wind down your home kitchen or the restaurant and close it up for the day.
